name: Far Cry 4: Escape from Durgesh Prison
name_original: Far Cry 4: Escape from Durgesh Prison
description:
Far Cry 4: Escape from Durgesh Prison is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft Montreal. It came out on 13-01-2015. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Far Cry 4: Escape from Durgesh Prison is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
